      • finalizeRecovery

        public void finalizeRecovery()
        Description copied from interface: RecoveryTargetHandler
        The finalize request clears unreferenced translog files, refreshes the engine now that new segments are available, and enables garbage collection of tombstone files. The shard is also moved to the POST_RECOVERY phase during this time
        Specified by:
        finalizeRecovery in interface RecoveryTargetHandler
